content: this crochet basket bag pattern is super easy to make and won t require too much yarn and it works up quick so there s still time to make a couple before xmas it s made with #6 super bulky so you know it works up pretty fast this crochet basket bag pattern includes 3 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #6 super bulky yarn i used lion brand wool-ease thick and quick in color wheat #6 super bulky yarn i used about 2 and one quarter skeins/230 yards crochet hook size 6mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker skill easy gauge 8 5 st x 12 row measurements 33 41 circumference x 10 tall *not including the straps thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
